name: Bloodhorns
description:
From BTH Karlshamn comes BLOODHORNS, a 3D arena shooter set in a gothic castle. Take part in the eternal fight for supremecy over your enemies!

Featuring:

  • Brutal weaponry, everything from assault rifles too claymore swords, we got you covered!
  • Gorgeous environment for you to kill your sworn enemies in!
  • Buckets upon buckets of blood and gore!

Don't delay, download BLOODHORNS today!!!
